Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of a priest with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with a blue painted beard and parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with illegible blue painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot(damaged at the back).
Condition: fair - damage to back of foot
